mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dgg_store.user_estimate(user_id, goods_id, estimate_text, estimate_num) VALUES (#{userId},#{goodsId},#{estimateText},#{estimateNum})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dgg_store.goods_enshrine WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND goods_id = #{goodsId}
mapper.select: SELECT gd.goods_id,gd.goods_name,gd.goods_price,imgsp.image_path FROM dgg_store.goodsinfo gd INNER JOIN dgg_store.goods_enshrine ge ON gd.goods_id = ge.goods_id INNER JOIN dgg_store.goods_image img ON img.goods_id = gd.goods_id INNER JOIN dgg_store.image_space imgsp ON imgsp.image_id = img.image_id WHERE img.goods_img_type = 1 AND ge.user_id = #{userId}
